channel.title: I NEED to know how to IP Ban NOW!
channel.description: someone keeps trying to crash my server how do i ip ban him

item.title: I NEED to know how to IP Ban NOW!
item.dc:creator: @Pureman0194 Pureman0194
item.description:
@Pureman0194 wrote:

[quote=“Tyrael, post:2, topic:182801”][ul][li]Go to your connectedfrom folder.
find their name.
Copy their ip.
Go to your data folder.
Openup bannedips.
Paste their ip.[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

-tyrael-[/quote]
Ha Ha Simple Or U Could Do This

::ipban -User-

Read full topic
item.source: I NEED to know how to IP Ban NOW!
